messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Carol/re colton
messages.msgSnippet: Sonia, I always think of you as being named sulan b/c of your e-mail.! LOL! Anyway,my dh and I decided we will have to do foster care if there is any lag time
messages.messageBody:
Sonia,
I always think of you as being named sulan b/c of your e-mail.! LOL!
Anyway,my dh and I decided we will have to do foster care if there is any lag
time between our kids being grownup and grandchildren arriving! We are
addicted to babies!
Bridget

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Carol/re colton
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 04/13/2000 12:42:04 AM Pacific Daylight Time, sulan@home.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 04/13/2000 12:42:04 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
sulan@... writes:

<< It'll be
exceptionally tough for me to ever "let my kids go". Of course I want
them to be healthy and happy and developed eventually, but it will be
the saddest day of my life when it comes. >>

I just told my gf the other day on the phone that I will probably have to
have another child or two a bit later in life so that I can cope with my
oldest dd growing up and leaving home (although she promises me she
will come over every day : )
Kathy
